short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format the table in the GitLab™ MR and Issue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use

1. Go to the GitLab edit page for the issue or merge request.
2. Create a table element in description.
3. Click the "Format Table" button to format the table element.
